story: Bran Stark was Lord for Stark House and was also known as the prophet in the entire kingdom. Everything was quiet when Tyrion Lannister threatened to make Bran Stark peaceful one day. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Rickon Stark to ask for help, Rickon Stark was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all his secrets. During a long training session in Saltpans at the Winter Solstice, Bran met Eddard Stark, who immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas Bran Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in Red Keep when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them, yet the two friends were ready and battle started, Bran Stark using fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran managed to save the beloved peace in The Vale of Arryn with Eddard Stark by making fireworks.
